name: Ramnath Goswami
body:
**Name :** Ramnath Goswami **Address :** Village : Agarbandh, P.O. : Hoomgarh, District : West Midnapore **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2015 **Mentor :** Nayan De (Bose Institute, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** Madhyamik : 61.3% ; Higher Secondary : 82.8% (Ranked 1 in school) **Present Course :** English (UG II), Garbeta College

From a remote village near Garbeta in West Midnapore, Ramnath lost his father at a very early age. Since then his mother has been toiling hard, doing menial jobs to feed the family. The family has no fixed income. Poverty and misfortune notwithstanding Ramnath stood first in his school in the Higher Secondary Examinations, securing 82.8%. Following which Ramnath got admitted to Garbeta College for a bachelorâ€™s in English in 2015. He is currently in his second year. Srijan Sujan will bear the responsibility of this phase of his academic journey.
